comments: ok so i went into this class expecting to develop my skills as an actor and let me tell you thats the last thing i did. The entire class is ridiculous and this teacher makes no sense when he tries to describe this method. The class is****. they just want your money.

Is a great teacher and really cares about his students and the material.Very polite with his comments but you can tell he holds back at times.Would have learned more if he were more blunt.Extraordinary actor.Grad student and better teacher than some of the faculty.Highly reccommend.
